attributes.action: Stop Rail companies inflating rail fares during commuting times .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the thousands of commuters who use public transport to go to work the fares are inflated , for the stay at home , unemployed and others the fares are reduced , the power , staff and manpower needed is the same at 12pm as say 7am ( the equilibrium between commuters and staff is reduced or increased to represent this ), so why on earth are commuters packed onto public transport in a way that we dont even let animals be transported and then chastised and victimised for making the effort to go to work , these are the real people keeping the country economically viable , and they are the ones suffering for doing so , why ?
